title: Add pre-commit JSONL flush for Dolt backend
description: After upgrading beads to v0.56.1 (Dolt backend), auto-flush to .beads/issues.jsonl no longer happens. Our GitHub Actions sync (beads-sync.yml) triggers on issues.jsonl changes, breaking the pipeline. Fix: add pre-commit hook logic that runs bd list --json, converts to JSONL, writes to issues.jsonl, and stages it. Also update git-with-beads.xml wording, update .beads/.gitignore for Dolt artifacts, and update install.ps1 if needed.
close_reason: Pre-commit hook now flushes Dolt DB to issues.jsonl via bd list --json. Post-merge hook fixed to auto-commit for Dolt. .gitignore updated for Dolt artifacts. git-with-beads.xml wording updated.
